snippet: Mr. Lindgren appeared with major American ballet companies before becoming the founding dean of the influential dance program at the North Carolina School of the Arts.
abstract: Robert Lindgren, Canadian-born ballet dancer who became founding dean of influential dance program at North Carolina School of the Arts, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lindgren appeared with major American ballet companies before becoming the founding dean of the influential dance program at the North Carolina School of the Arts.

headline.seo: Robert Lindgren, 89, Ballet Dancer and College Dean, Is Dead
